rukus.text: Palibe vuto limene limadza popanda chilolezo cha Mulungu ndipo aliyense amene amakhulupirira mwa Mulungu, Iye amatsogolera mtima wake ndipo Mulungu amadziwa chilichonse
Mverani Mulungu ndipo mverani Mtumwi wake. Koma ngati inu mukana, udindo wa Mtumwi wathu ndi kukuuzani uthenga wathu momveka ndi poyera
Mulungu! Kulibe Mulungu wina koma Iye yekha ndipo mwa Mulungu onse okhulupirira aike chikhulupiriro chawo

Oh inu okhulupirira! Ndithudi pakati pa akazi ndi ana anu alipo ena amene ndi adani anu, motero chenjerani! Koma ngati inu muwakhululukira ndipo simulabadira zoipa zawo, ndithudi, Mulungu ndi wokhululukira nthawi zonse ndi Mwini chisoni chosatha
Chuma chanu ndipo ana anu ndi mayesero pamene Mulungu ndiye amene ali ndi mphotho yaikulu

Kotero kwaniritsani udindo wanu kwa Mulungu ndipo muopeni Iye kwambiri. Mverani ndipo mumvere. Ndipo perekani chopereka chaulere. Chimenecho ndi chabwino kwa inu. Ndipo aliyense amene asiya umbombo adzakhala wopambana
Ngati mukongoza Mulungu ngongole yabwino, Iye adzaichulukitsa ndipo adzakukhululukirani machimo anu. Ndipo Mulungu ndi wokonzeka kuyamika ndi kulipira ndipo ndi wopilira kwambiri
Wodziwa zonse zobisika ndi zooneka ndipo ndiye Mwini mphamvu zonse ndi Mwini nzeru zonse
